name: Taming
description:
Now game is also avabile on  Android!

Did you ever asked yourself why characters that you command in all different kinds of games are obeying you?  Well maybe because they were electric shock each time when they  didn’t do things that they should…

This  game is just simple ‘endless faller’ with one exception.

Your character don’t obey you so you have to punish and reward she (first much more often than second) to do what she is told to.

You move by arrows and use buttons to punish or reward character.

Punishment is a signal that it should change it’s behaviour.

Candy is a reward so Kitten know that way she changed her behaviour was good and she changes it in the same way.

What are you taming is extremly simple artiffical inteligence.
